item.title: Global Crossing Ups Ante On Network Security
item.description:

Frequent news reports reveal compromised user accounts and credit card information, highlighting the immediate financial burden of these breaches. However, the long-term damage to customer trust and potential loss of business can be even more costly. Beyond these publicized incidents, espionage and intellectual property theft occur discreetly, posing a severe threat to businesses. item.title: IP WAN over MPLS Advantages
item.description:
The internet is often the first thing that comes to mind when considering IP wide area networks. Although it boasts near-universal accessibility and relatively low access costs, it presents significant drawbacks for business use. Factors like bandwidth, latency, jitter, and packet loss lack guarantees and predictability. Additionally, security on the internet is unreliable. However, are alternative methods for interconnecting business locations excessively expensive or difficult to manage? It’s feasible to establish a private IP network that enables the use of your existing IP addressing system, eliminating the need for encryption, firewalls, tunnels, or supplementary hardware...

item.title: Do You Need A Managed Security Services Provider?
item.description:

If your network holds valuable data, cybercriminals will see it as a target, making network security essential. Protecting your digital assets isn’t optional; the choice lies in managing it yourself or outsourcing it to managed security services, also known as Security as a Service (SaaS). item.title: Private Cloud In a Kit
item.description:
Cloud computing offers significant advantages, but you might be hesitant to move your sensitive applications to a public cloud environment. Fortunately, there are alternatives to public clouds. Besides public clouds, there are also private clouds and hybrid clouds. Hybrid clouds combine public and private cloud environments, allowing you to run less sensitive applications on the public cloud while maintaining more sensitive data on a private cloud. While public cloud cost savings are well-known, you might wonder if private clouds offer similar benefits...
